reviewText: Best resource for all things serging related I could find. A little dated on the project ideas, but the lessons all apply to today's techniques. I've owned a serger for over 15 years and I'm just now learning about all it can do. This DVD definitely helped!
Cannot find SEWING CDs. Wish there were more, price was right. Info is always timeless, watching is better than reading it all. Sound and Vision = good.
Over the years, I have bought just about every book they ever had printed. This is a very good dvd for me. I never have used my serger to it's full potential and learned a great deal from their dvd.
This DVD looks like it was made in the 60's. A real turn off to make any of the items. Disappointed in the DVD.
Excellent DVD. I am very pleased with it. There is no need for me to join a course from now on.
Just as good as the first DVD...helped me to expand what I do with my serger.  Again, I love that I can go back and watch a section over in order to understand the mechanics of the steps.
Very happy to have this DVD. I have been looking for an affordable one, and I found it on Amazon.
